# Jon Gerton - Web Developer

Jon Gerton's website serves as a portfolio and service platform for his web development work, aimed at local businesses and startups looking for quality web solutions. With emphasis on clarity and affordability, he offers WordPress sites and custom web applications tailored to meet diverse needs.

## About Jon

This section introduces Jon as a web developer with over 27 years in tech, largely focusing on web development. After starting as a Systems/Network Administrator, he transitioned to full-stack development and now specializes in helping local businesses establish an online presence through effective web solutions. Key points include:

- **Background**: Experience in various tech roles since 1998, with a focus on mentorship for junior developers.
- **Approach**: Custom solutions for different business sizes and needs.
- **Support**: Ongoing assistance and transparent communication with clients.

## Services Offered

Jon provides diverse web services catering to various business needs:

### $500 WordPress Sites
- Affordable sites for local businesses.
- Fast delivery within 5 business days.
- Mobile-friendly design and essential features included.

### Custom Web Applications
- Tailored to unique business requirements.
- Focus on scalability and modern technology.
- Ongoing maintenance and training provided.

### Team Growth Accelerator
- Mentorship and training tailored for development teams.
- Covers best practices in coding, testing, and performance optimization.

## Contact

Potential clients are encouraged to reach out with their project details. Jon offers multiple ways to connect:

- **Message Form**: Fill out a project inquiry form to receive a response within 1 business day.
- **Book a Call**: Schedule a free consultation for immediate discussions of project needs.
- **Other Connections**: Email, GitHub, and LinkedIn for additional communication avenues.

### Links
- Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
- GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
- LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

Showcases Jon's work, providing insight into his style and capabilities, though specific project details were not provided.

## FAQs

This section addresses common questions about Jon's services, including turnaround time, what's included in his offerings, and whether he supports clients outside of Alaska. 

### Noteworthy Points
- Quick delivery for WordPress sites (within 5 business days).
- Basic SEO and Google Maps integration included with the WordPress package.
- Support and revisions provided post-launch.
  
## Conclusion

Whether you're a local business needing an online presence or a startup seeking a custom solution, Jon Gerton is available to discuss your project and help you find the right strategy to succeed online.
